author: tvolkert
msg: Removed the 1.1 branch -- it has now been sealed as a tag

author: ritchiem
msg: Eat IllegalArgumentException when creating the signal handler, fixes startup on Windows.

author: clement
msg: The iPOJO API now supports external handlers. To use them, the handler provider has to implements HandlerConfiguration that returns the Element-Attribute structure representing the handler configuration.

author: andreas
msg: Add forrest namespace instead of removing it (XSLT needs it for Firedocs).
